title: I swear Riot unintentionally buffed the crap out of Veigar.
body: We need an AP QSS item too btw it's really annoying being a mid-laner with a QSS against a malz vs a balanced team because it's sorta high range and the item slot is really wasted late game but the ultimate is super super strong.

replies.body:
"unintentionally"? They literally buffed his W to make it easier to hit but let it keep its 100% AP ratio. Kinda ridiculous.

He was the same since his rework from 5.4 and people knew he was strong but risky. Another small buff in 5.5 and 5.6 made him a little better. 
The W and passive buff in 5.18 pushed him over the edge of, worth the risk.
take cleanse and you wont die
no they just nerfed all his counters.

Basically all champs builds now have more AP plus its easy to get more AP early - great for his farming, also bad for you because it increases his ult damage to you.

Rod got its HP nerfed.

Abyssal gives more AP.

Rylais got its HP nerfed.

Deathcaps % of AP bonus got increased - bad for you, good for him.

Because of the Needless being cheaper it's ridiculously easy to get needless and finish a Zhonya's which even leaves Assassins struggling against him.

They nerfed the crap out of MR.

Gave everyone free wards.

Made the jungle harder.

They made Teleport 100 second less cooldown if you TP to turrets and gave a heap of boot enchants that help him wickedly (Get back to lane faster or teleport and flash more often).

All these things for a late game hyper carry AP just left him over the top powerful.

He's ridiculously hard to shut down and once he gets rolling it's just a matter of time until the games over. He's unstoppable.
Then why wasn't he pick or ban at 5.13 then?

Solo queue =/= Highly co-ordinated teams communicating timers, strategies, whereabouts, positions, current status, priorities and status quo and pre-meditated and discussed compositions on a pro level (play to win).

The power picks for high ELO are very different from other ELOS and pro play is a league of its own when it comes to the changes in the dynamics of team compositions power ratings and the Champions that are broken OP can even be sub-par picks against such highly co-ordinated teams or with other highly co-ordinated and synergistic compositions available.

You need a strong frontline with decent damage for veigar to do well mid game in pro play (IMO) and a really tanky frontline can beat this so if you leave an opening for them to counter your team build (which they probably well) you've basically just lost in pick phase.

I used to play LAN Dota with friends and being friends communicating instantly and easily and planning things and discussing things and educating yourselves and each other and sharing things completely changed the power picks and while we still ran teams to support solo queue stompers we found it far more dominating and fun to co-ordinate mid level Heroes and comboing etc with far less solo queue stompy champs and more combo based Champions like SK, VS, Pudge, Lina and N'aix than supporting a solo queue stomper because this left mid level heroes underfed supporting them or left us weak to the exact combos (mid level powers) we preferred so we used to just run combos and smash people repeatedly with well timed, co-ordinated and planned plays and teamwork.

AP already have zhonyas.
also, just buy qss or mikaels, they both give mr and remove cc.
